miic.core.ndarray_sigproc.ndarray_filter¶

ndarray_filter(X, ftype, sampling_rate, filter_option)[source]¶

Filters data on X row-wise.

This is performed “in-place” on each row array. The original data are not accessible anymore afterwards.

Parameters:
  • X (ndarray) – Matrix to be filtered
  • ftype (string) – Filter type. It can be one of: [‘bandpass’,’bandstop’,’lowpass’,’highpass’]
  • sampling_rate (float) – Sampling rate
  • filter_option (dict) – Option specific for each type of filter. They are described in the corresponding View
Return type:

ndarray
Returns:

X_fil: Filtered matrix
